comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC, the inscription (TWICE) on Bain's negative reads HEIBURG, not HEIDBURG. But it turns out you are both wrong: the name is Lieutenant Elvin HEIBERG.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan: Thanks.  We'll correct the record next time we update.
